element.name: v4l2sink
element.description: Displays frames on a video4linux2 device
element.author: Rob Clark <rob@ti.com>,

element.name: v4l2src
element.description: Reads frames from a Video4Linux2 device
element.author: Edgard Lima <edgard.lima@indt.org.br>, Stefan Kost <ensonic@users.sf.net>
